caption.p: The mean proportion of North American contemporary woodpecker nonbreeding range retained by the end of the century based on the ensemble global climate model emissions scenarios (B2, A1B, and A2: listed from low to high emissions). The overall proportional change of the wintering range by 2080 compared to 2000 based on the high emissions climate model scenario (A2) and emissions scenario ensemble means (B2, A1B, and A2). Values <1 represent a decline. Data from Langham et al. ( 2015)
